title: Drawing, "Bon Voyage", 1936
medium: Pen and ink, brush and Chinese white on paper
description: Film star sitting on the deck railing of the Queen Mary holding a large bunch of flowers and waving goodbye. Row of women at railing looking daggers at her.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Bon Voyage", 1936.
1936. Pen and ink, brush and Chinese white on paper. Gift of Christina Malman. 1947-110-25.
